findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions add(uint256 _allocPoint, …), set(uint256 _pid, …) and updateEmissionRate() could invoke massUpdatePools() function, that can fail due to block gas limit if the pool size is too big. The function updateStakingPool() uses a loop to iterate all pools list and could be aborted with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there will be a long poolInfo list.

findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive privileges to modify critical settings and withdraw tokens when the ownership is not renounced.
findings.contract: Multiple contracts (VaultOwner, DEXToken, RewardToken, MasterBuilder, Orderbook)
